creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: square panel; brown felt with multicolored (predominately red) embroidery of floral and sunburst motifs with central medallion and four corner medallions; predominately red and white knit scroll trim with multicolored fringe; crocheted trim at top; red and grey printed paisley, star and flower backing
title: Ilgich
